Package org.sonatype.restsimple.api

Interface Summary
Action<T,U> An abstract representation of a Service.
ServiceDefinition A ServiceDefinition represents a REST resource.
 

Class Summary
ActionContext<T> This class encapsulates the REST request, e.g the headers, the form parameters, the path and it's value.
DefaultServiceDefinition A default ServiceDefinition which can be injected or created directly.
DeleteServiceHandler A ServiceHandler that support the DELETE HTTP method
GetServiceHandler A ServiceHandler that support the GET HTTP method
HeadServiceHandler A ServiceHandler that support the HEAD HTTP method
MediaType Represent a Media type consumed or produced by an Action.
PostServiceHandler A ServiceHandler that support the POST HTTP method
PutServiceHandler A ServiceHandler that support the PUT HTTP method
ServiceHandler Represent how a REST resource handles requests.
TypedAction<T,V> Simple Action that delegate the HTTP method operation to proper method implementation of GET, POST, PUT and DELETE.
 

Enum Summary
ServiceDefinition.METHOD Represent an HTTP Method
 

Exception Summary
ActionException A runtime exception thrown from an Action.
